content: this pattern is for begginers i used cotton yarn 8/4 2 00mm crochet hook but you can use another kind of yarn or size hook i hope you like it materials 2 00 mm crochet hook cotton yarn 8/4 yellow black and red black embroidery thread sewing needle fiberfill toy rattle box 9mm safety eyes 7cm wooden ring materiales crochet 2 00mm hilo de algodón 8/4 amarillo negro y rojo hilo de bordar negro aguja lanera y de bordar relleno cajita cascabel ojos de seguridad 9mm aro de madera 7cm
